official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to eliminate certain provisions relating to private carriage of mail, to permit free competition in the delivery of mail.

summary.text: Postal Reform Act - Permits the carriage of mail by private persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to eliminate certain provisions relating to private carriage of mail, to permit free competition in the delivery of mail.
